description: Powered by Justia, JurisPro (www.JurisPro.com) provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness Not Allowed to Testify on Credibility of the Parties
cases.description: Although Plaintiff's Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness could testify on his investigation, he could not opine on the credibility of the parties.

cases.title: Forensic Engineering Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Slip and Fall Case
cases.description: Even though Plaintiff's Forensic Engineering Expert Witness did not conduct tests or studies, the court ruled he could testify on the inspections of an unmarked curb.

cases.title: Firearms & Ballistics Expert Witness Testifies in Las Vegas Mass Shooting Case
cases.description: The Government's Firearms & Ballistics Expert Witness could testify on the use of ammunition used in the Las Vegas mass shootings, but he could not state that his conclusions were reached with scientific certainty.
